医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
气候变化成为湿疹的主要诱因在对所有已发表的评估特应性皮炎（也称为湿疹）与温室气体排放导致的气候相关危害趋势相关的研究进行分析后，研究人员发现，影响包括对湿疹的直接影响，例如野火引起的颗粒物引起的炎症，以及间接影响，例如干旱引起的粮食不安全造成的压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Climate-change-emerges-as-major-eczema-trigger.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Climate-change-emerges-as-major-eczema-trigger.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bef8e49d-496d-4c95-95d5-52a59fae4f05 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 13:14:19 -0500 Climate change emerges as major eczema trigger
怀孕期间的纯素饮食与较高的先兆子痫和较低的出生体重风险有关最近发表在《斯堪的纳维亚妇产学报》上的一项研究表明，在怀孕期间遵循纯素饮食的女性可能面临更高的患先兆子痫和生出出生体重较低的新生儿的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Vegan-diet-during-pregnancy-linked-to-higher-preeclampsia-and-lower-birth-weight-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Vegan-diet-during-pregnancy-linked-to-higher-preeclampsia-and-lower-birth-weight-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fe34dcc-e775-44d4-ab6d-8d1cc5cb5661 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 13:04:00 -0500 Vegan diet during pregnancy linked to higher preeclampsia and lower birth weight risks
新研究阐明了拇指关节炎治疗的遗传学根关节病，也称为斜方掌骨关节炎，是一种影响拇指的骨关节炎，治疗方法包括夹板固定和手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/New-study-Illuminates-the-genics-of-thumb-arthritis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/New-study-Illuminates-the-genics-of-thumb-arthritis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b0cbcdc-b8fb-4a35-8b41-c6b744aaba58 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 12:55:01 -0500 New study illuminates the genetics of thumb arthritis treatment
mRNA疗法复活p53以对抗卵巢肿瘤卵巢癌通常具有很强的侵袭性，并且对目前可用的疗法反应不佳。法兰克福歌德大学和法兰克福大学医院最近的一项研究为这种情况在中期内发生改变带来了希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/mRNA-therapy-revives-p53-to-combat-ovarian-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/mRNA-therapy-revives-p53-to-combat-ovarian-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=274bd3ec-36eb-4d40-b642-9342e5a653e0 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 12:39:47 -0500 mRNA therapy revives p53 to combat ovarian tumors
欧洲财团拨款 650 万欧元用于研究迷幻辅助疗法由 19 个合作伙伴组成的欧洲财团已获得欧盟超过 650 万欧元的资助，用于研究裸盖菇素，以治疗需要姑息治疗的进行性不治之症患者的心理困扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/European-consortium-awarded-e282ac65M-to-study-psychedelic-assistance-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/European-consortium-awarded-e282ac65M-to-study-psychedelic-assistance-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7abb2c0f-0a0c-40fe-b2a5-5a44daed0e26 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 12:19:59 -0500 European consortium awarded €6.5M to study psychedelic-assisted therapy
研究揭示了炎症性心血管疾病发展的新机制由慕尼黑大学研究人员 Christian Weber 和 Yvonne Döring 领导的研究小组展示了参与炎症性心血管疾病发展的新机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-reveals-new-mechanisms-involved-in-the-development-of-炎症-心血管-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-reveals-new-mechanisms-involved-in-the-development-of-炎症-心血管-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03640e1c-1ca1-4b29-82ff-0f34a6b6b4d8 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 12:08:13 -0500 Study reveals new mechanisms involved in the development of inflammatory cardiovascular diseases
大脑研究揭开了强烈药物记忆的秘密牛津大学医学研究委员会大脑网络动力学部门和纳菲尔德临床神经科学系的研究人员发现了一种新机制，大脑可以通过这种机制产生强大的持久记忆，从而驱动不明智的行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Brain-study-unlocks-secrets-of-strong-drug-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Brain-study-unlocks-secrets-of-strong-drug-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3b6586e-90b7-4efe-9079-98b938c2c662 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 11:49:56 -0500 Brain study unlocks secrets of strong drug memories
睡眠节律不规律与中年人心血管健康状况不佳有关根据最近的研究，不规律的睡眠节律与中年人心血管健康状况较差有关。不一致的就寝时间似乎尤其会增加腰围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Irregular-sleep-rhythm-linked-to-poorer-cardioangio-health-in-middle-ged-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Irregular-sleep-rhythm-linked-to-poorer-cardioangio-health-in-middle-ged-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cf8bfb7-980b-4ed0-8e01-86c7d5d9d708 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 09:38:46 -0500 Irregular sleep rhythm linked to poorer cardiovascular health in middle-aged people
研究表明 CBT 如何重塑焦虑儿童的大脑美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员发现，未经药物治疗的患有焦虑症的儿童的许多大脑区域过度激活，包括额叶、顶叶和杏仁核。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-shows-how-CBT-rewires-the-anxious-childs-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-shows-how-CBT-rewires-the-anxious-childs-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3424ba5-fb13-464a-9f80-d015a9a41ac3 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 07:45:00 -0500 Study shows how CBT rewires the anxious child's brain
人工智能治疗伴侣“复制品”在孤独学生中受到欢迎使用支持 GPT3 的聊天机器人对年轻人的心理健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/AI-Therapy-companion-replika-gains-traction-among-lonely-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/AI-Therapy-companion-replika-gains-traction-among-lonely-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05701245-9c9c-4760-93d1-992caff758c9 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 07:37:00 -0500 AI Therapy companion 'replika' gains traction among lonely students
